data.title: Whatfix - Digital Adoption Platform and Analytics
data.description: Whatfix's interactive digital adoption platform and analytics enable employees with contextual user experiences, step-by-step guidance, self-help user support, and user behavior analytics to drive digital adoption for desktop, mobile, and web applications.
data.content:

Whatfix Product Suite
---------------------

Digital Adoption Platform (DAP) Product Analytics Mirror

### Whatfix Digital Adoption Platform

Enable users with in-app guidance, on-demand user support, and customer contextual messages on web, desktop, and mobile applications.  
[Explore Whatfix DAP](https://whatfix.com/products/digital-adoption-platform/)

Enable Users With In-App Guidance ![Image 94](https://whatfix.com/wp-content/themes/whatfix-site/assets/images/angle-arrow.svg)

Guide users through complex applications and processes with in-app Flows, Task Lists, Smart Tips, Pop-Ups, and more to enable end-users to learn in the flow of work with product-led experiences.

Self Help User Support ![Image 95](https://whatfix.com/wp-content/themes/whatfix-site/assets/images/angle-arrow.svg)

Enable end-users with Self Help, an in-app resource center that integrates with your existing knowledge repositories and support resources, providing contextual answers to user queries at the moment of need.

Guidance Analytics ![Image 96](https://whatfix.com/wp-content/themes/whatfix-site/assets/images/angle-arrow.svg)

Gather engagement and usage data on your in-app content built with Whatfix. See Task List completion rates, Flow dropoffs, Smart Tip views, common Self Help queries, and more.

![Image 97: Video Thumbnail](https://fast.wistia.com/embed/medias/11yj6i7uit/swatch)

![Image 98: Video Thumbnail](https://embed-ssl.wistia.com/deliveries/1cefc985a2e32c8689cfd6119cd10be9.webp?image_crop_resized=640x360)

Click for sound

1:15

*   Enable Users With In-App Guidance
*   Self Help User Support
*   Guidance Analytics

### Whatfix Product Analytics

Unleash the full potential of your applications by analyzing engagement and making data-driven decisions that drive user adoption and product growth  
[Explore Whatfix Product Analytics](https://whatfix.com/products/product-analytics/)

No-Code Event Tracking ![Image 99](https://whatfix.com/wp-content/themes/whatfix-site/assets/images/angle-arrow.svg)

Set up custom user events to track without engineering dependencies, empowering application owners for internal applications and product teams for customer-facing apps.

AI-Powered, Actionable Insights ![Image 100](https://whatfix.com/wp-content/themes/whatfix-site/assets/images/angle-arrow.svg)

No need for deep analytics expertise. With Whatfix Product Analytics, uncover insights using a simple natural language conversational interface.

Analyze and Engage in One Platform ![Image 101](https://whatfix.com/wp-content/themes/whatfix-site/assets/images/angle-arrow.svg)

Capture behavioral insights, analyze them with Funnels and Journeys, and use them to improve product experiences within a single platform.

![Image 102: Video Thumbnail](https://fast.wistia.com/embed/medias/dgo1cg9h9k/swatch)

![Image 103: Video Thumbnail](https://embed-ssl.wistia.com/deliveries/893240734691c0b6c3307c69f291e130.webp?image_crop_resized=960x540)

Click for sound

1:14

*   No-Code Event Tracking
*   AI-Powered, Actionable Insights
*   Analyze and Engage in One Platform

### Whatfix Mirror

Create interactive sandbox replicas of web applications to enable users with hands-on IT training without risking live software usage.  
[Explore Whatfix Mirror](https://whatfix.com/products/mirror/)

Create Replica Application Environments ![Image 104](https://whatfix.com/wp-content/themes/whatfix-site/assets/images/angle-arrow.svg)

Easily create interactive, replica versions of any web app to provide end-users with a sandbox environment for hands-on software training or user testing when onboarding new employees, testing new features, or launching a new system.

Guide Users With Hands-On IT Training ![Image 105](https://whatfix.com/wp-content/themes/whatfix-site/assets/images/angle-arrow.svg)

Provide users with in-app guided experiences on your replica sandbox environments like Tours, Flows, and Task Lists to drive process adoption through simulated training experiences.

Auto-Capture IT Training Analytics ![Image 106](https://whatfix.com/wp-content/themes/whatfix-site/assets/images/angle-arrow.svg)

Automatically capture end-user behavior, actions, and engagement data to provide insights into the impact and ROI of your virtual IT training.

![Image 107: Video Thumbnail](https://fast.wistia.com/embed/medias/jchve0ixwl/swatch)

![Image 108: Video Thumbnail](https://embed-ssl.wistia.com/deliveries/9db1cd43fc3a5a619f67edbaba90532b.webp?image_crop_resized=960x540)

*   Create Replica Application Environments
*   Guide Users With Hands-On IT Training
*   Auto-Capture IT Training Analytics

Privacy Preference Center
-------------------------

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.

Allow All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Targeting Cookies

 Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.
